snippet: The chef Mario Batali has agreed to a proposed settlement in a class action lawsuit claiming that he unfairly confiscated employees' tips.
abstract: The chef Mario Batali has agreed to a proposed settlement in a class action lawsuit claiming that he unfairly confiscated employees' tips.

headline.main: Mario Batali Agrees to $5.25 Million Settlement Over Employee Tips
headline.print_headline: Batali Agrees to $5.25 Million Settlement Over Claims of Confiscated Tips
